name: Gnomageddon
summary:
In july 2015 it was reported that Sony Computer Entertainment trademarked the title Gnomeageddon, and spreading rumours of a new 3rd person deathmatch shooter being in development (similar to Gears of War). 
 
In August 2017 it was revealed that the game was effectevily cancelled and all development at SCE San Diego Studios had ceased. 
 
Early footage of gameplay was released via youtube by fans.

videos.name: Gameplay video
videos.title: Sony's Cancelled PlayStation 4 (PS4) Exclusive: Gnomageddon - Unseen64
